item.title: Exploration Strategies in DQN: Epsilon-Greedy vs Boltzmann
item.description: Understanding the two most common exploration strategies used in Deep Q-Learning: epsilon-greedy and Boltzmann (softmax) exploration.

item.title: Critic and DQN
item.description: Critic 在 Actor-Critic 中是个打分机器，而在 DQN 里它直接拿 Q 值做决策。

item.title: Is DQN an Online Q-learning Algorithm? Exploring the Boundary
item.description: Is DQN an online Q-learning method? What if the minibatch size is 1? This post explores when DQN behaves like an online algorithm and clarifies how it connects to classical Q-learning.
